title: The buildings which are in need of Extensive Repairs shall be preferably developed or redeveloped under the provisions of these Regulations
clause_text: The buildings which are in need of Extensive Repairs shall be preferably developed or redeveloped under the provisions of these Regulations. However, if development/redevelopment is not possible due to various reasons such as size/shape of plot, disputes and other reasons, then Extensive Repair may be allowed.
